Activity: Check emails and company communication channels. Review progress on the high-poly sculpting and texturing.
Continue texturing the high-poly models in Substance Painter. Focus on creating realistic materials and adding wear and tear to the surfaces.
Bake the high-poly details onto a low-poly model. This process will transfer the sculpted details into a normal map, which can be used to create the illusion of high-poly detail on a low-poly asset.
Import the low-poly model and textures into Unreal Engine. Set up the material and lighting to ensure that the asset looks good in the game engine.
Review the asset in Unreal Engine with @tart-1 and @lvdn-1 to get feedback on the overall look and feel. Discuss any necessary adjustments or optimizations.
Make necessary adjustments to the textures and materials based on the feedback received. Optimize the asset for performance in Unreal Engine.
